segments.text: Welcome to Flash Foot . What can I do for you , ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to have this roll of film developed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What size prints would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , ma'am , they'll be ready for you in an hour .
segments.speaker: S1
